Description:
Real Time Intelligence is a transformative technology designed to empower businesses with real-time data insights and analytics. This session will cover the journey of Real Time Intelligence from its inception to its current state, highlighting key features, capabilities, and the impact it has on operational efficiency and decision-making processes. We will also highlight customer success stories and showcase how you can revolutionize your data strategy and unlock new opportunities for growth.

Chapters: 0:00 - Industry Use Cases Highlighting Real-Time Intelligence Adoption 00:12:56 - Impact of real-time intelligence on hospital operations and patient care 00:14:30 - Addressing misconceptions about real-time intelligence cost and value 00:24:08 - Expanding graph to include hotels and traveler preferences 00:25:09 - Integration with Microsoft Sentinel and large-scale graph operations 00:33:26 - Demonstration of Copilot Data Exploration and natural language insights 00:34:51 - Discovering luggage processing delays as key contributor 00:35:49 - Introducing anomaly detector to identify unknown data issues 00:42:18 - Operations Agent now in public preview with customer feedback
Author: Microsoft Events
Title: Unlock the power of Real-Time Intelligence in the era of AI | BRK226
